title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Nova 2: Enterprise intelligence optimized for the real world (AIM3342)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Nova 2：为真实世界优化的企业智能 (AIM3342)
abstract: Introducing Amazon Nova 2 Lite and Nova 2 Pro with powerful any-to-text capabilities. This session explores how Nova 2 processes multiple input modalities—text, image, video, audio, and speech—to generate intelligent text responses optimized for real-world applications. We will dive into practical implementations of Nova 2 tool-calling features, browser automation, and seamless integration with development platforms. Whether you're building enterprise applications, handling complex document processing, or developing customer service solutions, this session will show you how to harness Nova 2's any-to-text capabilities for your specific use cases.
abstract_cn: 介绍 Amazon Nova 2 Lite 和 Nova 2 Pro 及其强大的任意输入到文本的能力。本次会议探讨 Nova 2 如何处理多种输入模态——文本、图像、视频、音频和语音——以生成针对实际应用优化的智能文本响应。我们将深入探讨 Nova 2 工具调用功能、浏览器自动化以及与开发平台无缝集成的实际实现。无论您是构建企业应用程序、处理复杂文档处理，还是开发客户服务解决方案，本次会议都将向您展示如何针对您的特定用例利用 Nova 2 的任意输入到文本能力。

presenter.name: Firat Elbey
presenter.title: Principal Product Manager - Tech, AGI FMs

presenter.name: Ryan Hoium
presenter.title: Head of Applied AI Solutions, Amazon Nova
